original_text: You should also pull out some barley and drop it for her to pick up. Do not be angry with her.’
korean_text: 또 그를 위하여 곡식 다발에서 조금씩 뽑아 버려서 그에게 줍게 하고 꾸짖지 말라 하니라

sentences.original_text: You should also pull out some barley
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또 보리를 좀 꺼내야 한다

sentences.original_text: and drop it for her to pick up
Do not be angry with her
